# Overview

This section captures everything you need to build something within the KYVE ecosystem. Depending on what you 
are searching for, you have to select what kind of developer you are:

<BuildOverview />

<br></br>

:::info
If you're planning to build something specific, or you can't find what you're searching for, just ask the KYVE
community in our [Discord](https://discord.gg/kyve).
:::
